<p> OrientationInterpolator generates a series of 4-tuple axis-angle SFRotation values. Authors can ROUTE value_changed output events to a Transform node's rotation field or to another 4-tuple SFRotation field. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#OrientationInterpolator" target="_blank">OrientationInterpolator</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/interp.html" target="_blank">19 Interpolation component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/interp.html#Concepts" target="_blank">19.2 Concepts</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/interp.html#OrientationInterpolator" target="_blank">19.4.6 OrientationInterpolator</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter08AnimatingPositionOrientationScale" target="_blank">Chapter 08 Animating Position Orientation Scale</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter07EventAnimationInterpolation" target="_blank">Chapter 07 Event Animation Interpolation</a> </li> </ul>
